scripts.start:backend: cd orpheus-engine-workstation/backend/agentic_rag && FLASK_APP=main.py FLASK_ENV=development python -m flask run --port 5000
scripts.build: cd orpheus-engine-workstation/frontend && NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm run build
scripts.lint:frontend: echo 'Linting frontend via build process...' && cd orpheus-engine-workstation/frontend && NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm run build
scripts.validate: npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:prepare && npm run version:patch
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:prepare && npm run version:minor
scripts.release:major: npm run release:prepare && npm run version:major
scripts.release:prepare: git checkout main && git pull origin main && git merge develop
scripts.version:patch: npm run validate && npm run changelog && npm version patch -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm run validate && npm run changelog && npm version minor -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm run validate && npm run changelog && npm version major -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.branch:feature: git checkout develop && git checkout -b feature/$npm_config_name
scripts.branch:hotfix: git checkout main && git checkout -b hotfix/$npm_config_name
scripts.branch:cleanup: git branch --merged | grep -v '\*\|main\|develop' | xargs -r git branch -d
